title: War in Ukraine: Part 2 – The New World - Ep 149
itunes:title: War in Ukraine: Part 2 – The New World - Ep 149
description:
Just as 9/11 dramatically changed the flow of history, resulting in two wars and hundreds of thousands of deaths, so too will Putin’s invasion of Ukraine. Right now, we are seeing only the first effects and getting glimpses of second-order effects. The broad third-order effects will not be visible for a long time, though they’ll be obvious in hindsight.

Link to Ukraine Charities: https://contrarianedge.com/ukraine-charities/

War in Ukraine: Part 1 article link: https://contrarianedge.com/war-in-ukraine-why-i-was-blindsided-part-1/

The Making of the Capitalistic Pig article link: https://contrarianedge.com/the-making-of-capitalistic-pig/

Why Green Energy is a Luxury Belief – But Won’t Be One Forever article link: https://contrarianedge.com/why-green-energy-is-a-luxury-belief-but-wont-be-one-forever/

You can read this article online here: https://contrarianedge.com/war-in-ukraine-part-2-the-new-world/
